trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event is raised when the `Cancel` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>evento viene generato quando il `Cancel` pulsante per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the `Delete` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>evento viene generato quando il `Delete` pulsante per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event is raised when the `Edit` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>evento viene generato quando il `Edit` pulsante per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>evento viene generato quando tutti i pulsanti per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Ciò consente di verificare quando si fa clic sul pulsante di comando specifico a livello di codice e intraprendere l'azione appropriata.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene utilizzato comunemente per gestire i pulsanti di comando personalizzato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the `Update` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>evento viene generato quando il `Update` pulsante per un elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataListCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di DataListCommandEventArgs, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per creare e inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>viene creato da una chiamata a questo costruttore, le proprietà seguenti vengono inizializzate sui valori specificati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |Item|The value of the `item` parameter.| |CommandSource|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | Elemento | Il valore di `item` parametro. | | CommandSource | Il valore di `commandSource` parametro. |

trans-unit.source: The selected item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento selezionato dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: L'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the original event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento originale.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to determine the command source that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà CommandSource per determinare l'origine del comando che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine which command raises the event.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene comunemente utilizzata per determinare il comando che genera l'evento.

trans-unit.source: You can then take appropriate action, based on the command.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile intraprendere l'azione appropriata in base al comando.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: L'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item containing the command source in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento che contiene l'origine del comando nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to access information about the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà Item per accedere alle informazioni sull'elemento selezionato nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta l'elemento selezionato nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controllo.
